TopicTitle: The Ultimate Guide: Bringing Back the Ancient Mainsail

Articles.Content: Remember when Squad did a texture revamp of the Mainsail engine. You know the giant engine for the 2.5 parts. Well, do you miss the old texture? You can bring the old texture without mods or going back to old versions. This is possible to do on console fo console players.  First go into the Space Plane Hanger or the Vehicle Assembly Building. Then look through the pre-made crafts. Scroll down or up in both tabs until you find a picture of a craft with the old Mainsail texture. The craft in the VAB or SPH should have the old Mainsail Texture (unless Squad fixed that already). If not there you go! The old Mainsail engine at your disposal!

I think you use the filter/search functions on the left-hand side (in the VAB) you can find the older parts. They used to still be in the game after being deprecated, this was just a way to remove them without ruining any old craft still flying around after the update.
Im unsure if it still works, I last saw it many updates ago, but it should show the old Terrier engine, maybe old Jet engines, fuels tanks, and the like.
I hope squad doesn’t fix them, I like some of the old textures.

9 minutes ago, Wizard Kerbal said:
